entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
